name: PixelMagic
changelog:
• Launcher3 with most customizations is back
  • added LMO Freeform windows
  • added UDFPS animations
  • added "Less boring notifications"
  • added GameSpace
  • added Buttons and Gestures customizations
  • implemented multiple audio sources audio playback
  • reworked "Recents" look to more simple and clean look
  • reworked Ambient gestures
  • added Launcher widgets
  • A lot of other changes i can't fit in the one rom post
notes:
• Magicxavi also maintains RisingOS, crDroid 10, PixelMagic 14 and YAAP.
  • Bugs: Portrait and night mode in miui camera, and Voice recognition for "OK Google" not working, Maybe more
  • Use the latest boot.img from notes.
  • Thanks to all my contributors :)
